item.description:
Welcome to Build Hello Recruitment

We’re currently in a start-up stage.

That means we’re ‘picking teams,’ so to speak.

Our Process

The process we follow as a start-up, and the process you may want to follow, as a potential Build Hello partner or employee, is similar to the processes professional sports teams follow.

item.description: maangchi.com supports the online popularity of a well-known YouTube and network celebrity. Maangchi has a following with over 6 million YouTube subscribers. We looked to her website to review a wordpress website that gets a lot of action!

item.title: Privacy
item.description:
Privacy Policy

Last updated: August 11, 2016

This Privacy Policy relates to information collected by any websites, applications and/or other online services that Build Hello may make available from time to time (collectively, “Build Hello” or “we” or “us” or “our” or the “Site”) and is part of the Build Hello Terms of Use and Conditions located here. We reserve the right to change, modify or amend this policy at any time by posting changes on this site. Your continued use of the resources on this site, after changes are posted, constitutes your acceptance of this policy as modified by the posted changes. Terms of Use and Privacy Policy We encourage you to periodically review this policy.

item.title: Terms
item.description:
Terms and Conditions of Use:

Last updated: July 08th, 2023

Build Hello (“Build Hello” or “we”, www.buildhello.ca, “our” or “us”) is both a Trade Name and Trade Mark, owned by Yuri Tricys. Build Hello operates the Build Hello website located at https://buildhello.ca, and engages in web technology consulting, web development, and web design services, collectively ‘The Services.’

item.title: Why Build A Website With Hugo, the Hugely Popular Static Website Generator?
item.description: There’s every reason to build a website with Hugo. Starting with lightening fast builds, low maintenance, minimal hosting resource demands, easy application development life-cycle.

item.title: What Are the Top Four Most Popular Content Management Systems? | Build Hello | We design, code, and fix websites in a way that lowers your five year developer cost.
item.description: Read this post to learn about the top four most popular content management systems used globally in 2021 …

item.title: What Is Above The Fold Content? | Build Hello | We design, code, and fix websites
item.description:
Above The Fold

When you first navigate to a website the content you see on the screen is called above the fold content.

On any device, loading above the fold content first, and the rest of the content later, will speed up the rendering of the website by the browser.

item.title: Website Images | Build Hello | We design, code, and fix websites, and minimize how much it costs to develop a website over the span of your five year business plan.
item.description: While videos drive more social media engagement than images, images remain one of the most important aspects of web design. They play a key role in creating attraction and conveying brand identity.

item.title: What is Lighthouse? | Build Hello | We design, code, and fix websites, and we do it in a way that lowers your five-year developer cost.
item.description: Chrome browser comes with an easy to use website audit tool included. Auditing your website will let you know what Chrome thinks about it in terms of performance. Learn how to audit your website here.

item.title: Prices | Build Hello Business | Where can find great deals on websites, graphic design, wordpress, developers, Vancouver, Surrey, Burnaby, West Vancouver?
item.description:
Flat Rate Prices

We offer flat rate pricing, in Canadian dollars, based on scope of work signed off.

See US/CAD exchange rate.

See our package deals, or give us a call, drop a note in our form, or throw over an e-mail. We'll get back to you speedily and book you in for a free consultation and quote.

item.title: Starter Package | Build Hello Business | Many fine tasks quickly combined and mixed like pancake batter into one incredibly complete looking website, for just $899?
item.description: Starting a business means launching a new website, but building it yourself takes forever. Our quickstart starter package delivers the bare minimum. It’s an easy way to get something good looking up you can work on later.

item.title: Design | Build Hello Business | Sketches. Scribbles on the back of napkins. Wireframes. Mockups. Prototypes.
item.description: Because it feels good to know your website design is original you. We help out with sexy ideas, and even put together prototypes and mockups you can view and share with your team online.

item.title: Our Mission Is To Lift You Higher
Web Development | Build Hello Business | Basically we build you a space ship, a space station, a space world...whatever you want.
item.description: When your business is online, customers can see your on their phones! That’s where you want to be! Give us a call to help out with, oh any websites you’ve ever dreamed of!

item.title: Content Writing | Build Hello Business | Carefully crafted words arranged in clever, campy and carefree, or confident and credible, crisp, non-cursive character strings (assuming you don't want cursive.)
item.description: Text, text, and more text. We write it. We edit it. We make it yours. Content writing for the web is a technical art-form. It’s a blend of research, style, and optimization. It’s something we do for you.

item.title: Refactoring | Build Hello Business | That's 'refactoring of code,' which is to say modernizing and simplifying any...how can we say this politely...'cryptography' you've been saddled with into a modern top tier code base.
item.description: Refactoring your code base is more than proactive troubleshooting, it’s SEO, security, and better functionality all in one. Stay ahead of the crowd, refactor that code base!

item.title: Maintenance | Build Hello Business | Tracking down that stray semi-colon. Pest Control. Very unpleasant virus removal. Updates!
item.description: When you have a website problem, you have a business problem. At Build Hello we put website problems to rest, so your business can rise and shine!
